data.title: Client SDK Download
data.meta_description: Why do IBM and HCL keep hiding the CSDK download? It used to be less of a big deal because it was bundled with the engine. Now it no longer is, and the only stu
data.text:
Original Message:

Sent: Thu June 24, 2021 02:17 PM

From: TOM GIRSCH

Subject: Client SDK Download

Why do IBM and HCL keep hiding the CSDK download? It used to be less of a big deal because it was bundled with the engine. Now it no longer is, and the only stuff available on Passport Advantage is 4.10 and older or the Windows versions of 4.50. When I try to download via the iiug.org link, it gets about two click in before webroot declares that I'm being redirected to a phishing site.

I should just be able to get it through PA like everything else, or via FixCentral if that fails.

------------------------------

TOM GIRSCH

------------------------------

#Informix Original Message:

Sent: Thu June 24, 2021 02:17 PM

From: TOM GIRSCH

Subject: Client SDK Download

Why do IBM and HCL keep hiding the CSDK download? It used to be less of a big deal because it was bundled with the engine. Now it no longer is, and the only stuff available on Passport Advantage is 4.10 and older or the Windows versions of 4.50. When I try to download via the iiug.org link, it gets about two click in before webroot declares that I'm being redirected to a phishing site.

I should just be able to get it through PA like everything else, or via FixCentral if that fails.

------------------------------

TOM GIRSCH

------------------------------

#Informix Original Message:

Sent: 6/24/2021 3:03:00 PM

From: Art Kagel

Subject: RE: Client SDK Download

Here's the link:

Informix - Developer Tools

It's billed as a "trial" but there's no expiration to it and the CSDK is free anyway. Just scroll down to the "Client Software Development Kit" box and click on the "Try free edition" link there.

------------------------------

Art S. Kagel, President and Principal Consultant

ASK Database Management Corp.

www.askdbmgt.com

------------------------------

Subject: Client SDK Download

Art:

That's the one that webroot complained about maybe two clicks in. This time it worked, but I still had to play 20 questions as if I'm a prospective customer. I'm an existing customer, and I should be able to easily download the product without jumping through all those hoops!

Subject: RE: Client SDK Download

I agree, but as it stands, that's what we've got. You can understand that they want to opportunity to reach out to anyone downloading free product in the hopes of selling them something that generates revenue.

Anyway, I will bring it up with IIUG Board and so with IBM.

------------------------------

Art S. Kagel, President and Principal Consultant

ASK Database Management Corp.

www.askdbmgt.com

I'll make no comments on how difficult it to find something in an IBM website ��

Those URLS work for me

CSDK - https://www-01.ibm.com/marketing/iwm/iwm/web/preLogin.do?source=ifxdl

Innovator C - https://www-01.ibm.com/marketing/iwm/iwm/web/preLogin.do?source=swg-ifxnce

Developer https://www-01.ibm.com/marketing/iwm/iwm/web/preLogin.do?source=ifxids

JDBC https://www-01.ibm.com/marketing/iwm/iwm/web/preLogin.do?source=ifxjdbc

Subject: RE: Client SDK Download

To be fair it seems to have got better and it is a lot easier to find stuff in there than I remember it being.

I share everyone's frustration around finding downloads. I don't have any trouble now I know 14.10 server is on PA only and CSDK is via the trials and demos site but this wasn't communicated to customers very well in the beginning. Don't ask me where the JDBC driver is but I did find it in the past so I think I could again :)

Ben.

#Informix Original Message:

Sent: Fri June 25, 2021 09:15 AM

From: TOM GIRSCH

Subject: Client SDK Download

The point is, there should be one-stop shopping. Give me ONE PLACE I can go to download ALL of the products to which I am entitled. And don't make me download trial versions of products I'm licensed to use. Don't make me pretend to be a prospect (and answer the same series of prospect questions every time a new version comes out) when I've been a paying customer for decades.

Original Message:

Sent: 6/25/2021 4:12:00 AM

From: Benjamin Thompson

Subject: RE: Client SDK Download

I share everyone's frustration around finding downloads. I don't have any trouble now I know 14.10 server is on PA only and CSDK is via the trials and demos site but this wasn't communicated to customers very well in the beginning. Don't ask me where the JDBC driver is but I did find it in the past so I think I could again :)

Ben.

#Informix Original Message:

Sent: Tue October 31, 2023 02:00 PM

From: Sanjiv Kumar

Subject: Client SDK Download

I am not able to download the Linux Version of CSDK. Only windows version is available under my PA account. I opened the ticket with support, i got response that we are only entitled to download windows version. If we need Linux version, we have to buy it separately. They refereed me to the sales rep and he has the same story.

Did any of you have the same issue, were you able to resolve it?

------------------------------

Sanjiv Kumar

Original Message:

Sent: Fri June 25, 2021 09:15 AM

From: TOM GIRSCH

Subject: Client SDK Download

The point is, there should be one-stop shopping. Give me ONE PLACE I can go to download ALL of the products to which I am entitled. And don't make me download trial versions of products I'm licensed to use. Don't make me pretend to be a prospect (and answer the same series of prospect questions every time a new version comes out) when I've been a paying customer for decades.

Original Message:

Sent: 6/25/2021 4:12:00 AM

From: Benjamin Thompson

Subject: RE: Client SDK Download

To be fair it seems to have got better and it is a lot easier to find stuff in there than I remember it being.

From: TOM GIRSCH

Subject: Client SDK Download

Why do IBM and HCL keep hiding the CSDK download? It used to be less of a big deal because it was bundled with the engine. Now it no longer is, and the only stuff available on Passport Advantage is 4.10 and older or the Windows versions of 4.50. When I try to download via the iiug.org link, it gets about two click in before webroot declares that I'm being redirected to a phishing site.

I should just be able to get it through PA like everything else, or via FixCentral if that fails.

#Informix Original Message:

Sent: 10/31/2023 4:20:00 PM

From: Art Kagel

Subject: RE: Client SDK Download

Ignore your PA account for CSDK, it is free so you can just download it by clicking on the "Try the Developer Edition" button on the IBM Informix main page (www.informix.com) main page, logging in, and following the prompts. Then just enter "SDK" in the search box and you will see all of the most recent releases of the Informix CSDK.

Art

------------------------------

Art S. Kagel, President and Principal Consultant

ASK Database Management Corp.

www.askdbmgt.com
